records.name: Stir-fried beef
records.instructions: Trim fat from beef and cut into thin strips. In a large nonstick skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add beef and garlic; stir-fry 2 minutes. Add stir-fry vegetables, broccoli and soy sauce; cook an additional 3 minutes or until vegetables are crisp-tender and beef is cooked through.

records.name: Rice, brown
records.instructions: Prepare rice according to package directions, omitting added salt and fat.
